TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LoggerDescription extends System.Object

summary.span: 以值集合的形式包含有关记录器的信息，这些信息可用于实例化记录器，并可以进行序列化以在不同进程之间传递。

span.span: Contains information about a logger as a collection of values that can be used to instantiate the logger and can be serialized to be passed between different processes.

MemberSignature.Value: public LoggerDescription (string loggerClassName, string loggerAssemblyName, string loggerAssemblyFile, string loggerSwitchParameters, Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity verbosity);

span.span: The class name of the logger.

summary.span: 利用给定数据创建记录器说明。

span.span: Creates a logger description from the given data.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Framework.ILogger CreateLogger() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 利用此说明中的数据创建一个 ILogger 实例。

span.span: Creates an ILogger instance from the data in this description.

returns.span: 来自此说明中的数据的一个 ILogger 实例。

span.span: An ILogger instance from the data in this description.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果数据无效，此方法可能会引发各种反射异常。This method may throw a variety of reflection exceptions if the data is invalid. 它负责的调用方根据需要处理这些异常。It is the responsibility of the caller to handle these exceptions if desired.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Verbosity As LoggerVerbosity

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 返回此记录器的详细级别。

span.span: Returns the verbosity level for this logger.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于命令行显示，所有记录器都获取相同的详细级别。For command line display, all loggers get the same verbosity level.
